first_para: Thomas Anthony "Tom" Watson (born 8 January 1967) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for West Bromwich East since 2001. Watson was a Parliamentary Secretary for the Cabinet Office from 2008 to 2009.

full.extract:
Thomas Anthony "Tom" Watson (born 8 January 1967) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for West Bromwich East since 2001. Watson was a Parliamentary Secretary for the Cabinet Office from 2008 to 2009.
In 2011, Ed Miliband appointed Watson as the first ever Deputy Chair of the Labour Party and the Labour Party's Campaign Co-ordinator. He resigned from the Campaign position on 4 July 2013, in light of the developing 2013 Labour Party Falkirk candidate selection row.
full.title: Tom Watson (politician)
